titles.title: Klamath Tribe Judgment Fund Repeal Act
Klamath Tribe Judgment Fund Repeal Act
A bill to repeal the Klamath Tribe Judgment Fund Act.
Klamath Tribe Judgment Fund Repeal Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Klamath Tribe Judgment Fund Repeal Act
This bill repeals the Klamath Tribe Judgment Fund Act, which sets forth how funds credited to the Klamath Tribe must be distributed.
